Reviews.AuthorLocation: New York, New York, United States
Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay again.”
Reviews.Author: Clarissa B
Reviews.Content: So much better than staying right on the boardwalk in Ocean City- You can actually relax here as intended when you venture to the beach being just across the bridge from the boardwalk. It’s also right across the street from outlets for rainy/ sunburn recoup days at the beach. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful from check-in to check-out with smiles, “Good mornings!”, and must-do-in-OC recommendations the next day (which we did try and absolutely loved! Ask them!) Bonus points for having a clean outdoor pool in Ocean City!

Reviews.Title: “disgusting dirty rooms”
Reviews.Author: P D
Reviews.Content: Bathroom was not cleaned, spiders and mosquitos on walls and ceiling, dirt was thick under beds and grossly inbetween the headboard and mattress. Girls that clean rooms spoke little english and didn't understand that I asked for more towels. I put the "DO NOT DISTURB" sign on door and they still entered which I was not happy! We went back in June for the air show. The air conditioner SMELLED the entire time and we had to buy air freshners. Never AGAIN!!!

Reviews.Title: “MOLD on Ceiling Urine on toilet”
Reviews.Author: Lizzy616
Reviews.Content: I looked at the hotel website without looking at trip advisor first. As soon as we arrived I laid back on the bed looked up a found a larger round spot of black mold Yes not just a dark water spot but Black Mold growing on the spot. I reported to the front desk was told that there were no rooms available but one with a single bed which I couldn’t do. I also asked for a new set of blankets so that when the maintenance man came I could change the sheets for the mold being cleaned above it. When we returned from lunch the Mold was gone but no sheets. The underside of the toilets had not been cleaned you could see the urine on it. The floor was covered with sand and dirt from the beach theses did not get swept the whole 4 days we were there. I had to wipe it up with a rag I left the pile on the 2nd day beside the trash can it stayed there, was still there when we left. Both Beds were broke made a loud crash sound when my son laid in it and mine was lopsided. Under the beds were dusty and the beds were covered in mattress covers so I always check for bed bugs none here but nasty mattresses. Cigarette butts all over the outside grounds. They never returned the same amount of bath tails and they were small and cheap. Just Horrible and for $180 a night Never Again.

Reviews.Title: “If you like living in the hood”
Reviews.Author: akreitzer
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel a handful of times and never had a problem but my recent stay was horrible! The air conditioner leaked water all over the floor and when we called the office about the maintenance guy showed up and stuffed towels under it to soak up the water. They said they would be by the next day to fix it and they never did until we called again. The bathroom door didn't shut. And our neighbors were allowed to cook on a grill right below our room. The smoke went inside the ac vent and stunk our room up. If I wanted to smell that I would have stayed at a campground. And these neighbors thought it was cute to take our chairs outside our room. If you like the ghetto you will love this place!

Reviews.Title: “Are kidding me!!!”
Reviews.Author: krystin1010
Reviews.Content: This hotel is the worst!!!Me,my fiance and 3 kids came for a few days as soon as we walked thru the door and I put my 9 month down he found a black hair ball and put it in his mouth!!!Gross right,then the toilet overflowed 3 times the staff gave me a plunger to fix it!!I didn't know it was my job the plunge there toilets.It was dirty the maids need to learn how to clean.Then to top it off I was laying in bed and the headboard fell off and hit me in the head it left a big bump and It left me with the worst headache ever.When I told them the said sorry yeah that's it just a apology was all I got.After compaining many many times they finally gave me a whole 75.00 off.I should have m whole stay comped and free stays for life if you ask me,not that I would ever want to return.When I get home I think I will be contacting my attorney.

Reviews.Title: “Great place...clean and FRIENDLY service!”
Reviews.Author: KimRiccio
Reviews.Content: I use Bedtime Inn every time I visit my sons who live in Ocean City MD......the rooms are clean and the people that work there go outta there way to make you feel "at home"....Freindly "check In" and "check out" they really make sure your stay there is everything it should be.I recommend this place for anyone ! Hop skip n jump from the beaches and shopping... not to mention the good food on location or in a mile radius..they will def find me returning year after year!

Reviews.Title: “Cheap but not so great!”
Reviews.Author: Aislingw
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the bed time inn and suits for a couple of nights as we were travelling around America! The rooms are ok there basic but clean. However the bathrooms were very outdated and very very small. The sink Was outside the bathroom in the bedroom. The motel was out from ocean City a little therefore it required walking on the main highway to get into the centre which was very dangerous at night time! The pool was dirty, it had clumps of hair floating around it and stuck to the sides! As I said we were travelling so we were not being that picky with where we stayed we were looking for value however if you were staying here for a family vacation or a week I would Not advise this motel as there are much nicer ones in the centre which we moved to! We had also met friends whilst travelling and had told them we were staying here, they decided to call over one day whilst we were not there and to my horror the cleaning lady let them into our apartment without even asking any Questions which I feel Was very bad as they could have been anybody! So my advice to anyone looking to stay here would be to spend an extra few dollars and get something a bit nicer in ocean city !

Reviews.Title: “Unassuming period motel,clean friendly, affordable and relaxing”
Reviews.Author: kellmar
Reviews.Content: Don't be fooled by this period motel. It's well kept, very professionally operated. The staff can not do enough to make your stay comfortable and pleasant. It's location is tops with shops, restaurants within walking distance. We have been staying here for the past three years on a monthly bases.

Reviews.Title: “great service great location very clean and the price is very affordable”
Reviews.Author: michael w
Reviews.Content: This is are fourth time staying at bedtime inn the experience always amazes me and the family. we love the location we love the hospitality we love the peace and quiet atmosphere. ps.BEDTIME INN ALWAYS SEEMS TO MAKE ME AND MY WIFE PROUD THANK YOU!

Reviews.Title: “affordable price”
Reviews.Author: Sergio C
Reviews.Content: Have been going there for 4 years. Service has been excellent and efficient. Rooms were cleaned daily. Pool was a great bonus for the price. Made our family vacation just so much better Thanks bedtime inn

Reviews.Title: “NICE AND AFFORDABLE!”
Reviews.Author: Anthonio C
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in this hotel for the last 2 years and I had good experiences with the personal and overall of the room. It's quiet at night, all appliances work perfectly fine, parking lot is outside the hotel room, clean outdoor pool, service id honest and they do not touch any items except for what they have to clean or change, plenty room for the family. I would recommend this Hotel to other families .

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: EWestman
Reviews.Content: Pleasant Stay, great location. Had a nice family vacation. There were a lot of nearby attractions we did. The motel offered everything we needed. Clean outdoor pool. Near Assateague Island. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “not so bad”
Reviews.Author: b l
Reviews.Content: the room was quite and good but the shower curtain smells so bad and the bathroom sink is also disgusting, the rest was fine and we have to drive to the boardwalk, the swimming pool is nice but needs more attention, the water was dirty

Reviews.Title: “Great Deal!”
Reviews.Author: MariaClara73
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this motel last minute and was very pleased with the deal we got. Great bang for your buck. We stayed 5 nights and paid for 4 with a promotion they were having. We were able to shop up the road at the outlets with the money we saved on accomodations and had a great time at the onsite Mexican Restaurant. The staff was great, loved the location and the room was clean. Would recommend it and we will be going back this summer.

Reviews.Title: “I would rather stay in a maximum security prison cell with Bubba”
Reviews.Author: Jay B
Reviews.Content: Do not stay here!! Once inside the room, you can definitely tell the owners/mangement put in the minimum amount of work to reap the maximum. The floor was covered with sand and dirt, the walls looked like they haven't been painted or wiped down in about ten years, the shower curtain was covered with mold and mildew, the bathtube hardly drained when taking a shower and was dirty, the bed spread wasn't properly cleaned and looked to have cheetos stains, the pillow covers had make-up and other unknown stains only a blue light could determine, and the television had no remote. Besides that, everything seemed fine. What a dive!!!

Reviews.Title: “Everything was okay -- but walk to ocean”
Reviews.Author: breeze63
Reviews.Content: the price was reasonable but not glamourous don't expect a lot from this hotel

Reviews.Title: “waste of money”
Reviews.Author: Armand w
Reviews.Content: First i would like to say this place that is called a hotel should me call a dumb. 1st off they lie about being on the boardwalk. 2nd the room smell so bad me and my girlfriend couldn't sleep. 3rd we called about getting some more towels from your room and the front desk told us to come up and get it. but they are to qucik to get you out. NEVER again would we be going there again. we found a better and cheaper room on the boardwalk for 60.00 a night. by the way this hotel is not in ocean city its sit right out side of the city area. but you real need to drive there.

Reviews.Title: “soooo nasty”
Reviews.Author: byolandabrown2
Reviews.Content: i stayed there on 6/16/2012 it was thee worst place ever i got to my room the room smelled like rust went to the office to tell them the problem that i had in the room the lady at the front desk was like what do you want me to do about i can give you your money back and you can find another hotel and was not being rude to her at all so i said do you have another room she like no so said if you dont have a room available why do you have a vacancy so she magically found another room and this room was so small my walk in closet i bigger then it went to take a shower other people hair was on the wall someone use the bathroom and left splashes of crap under the toilet so gross.................so please do not stay at this hole in wall tell

Reviews.Title: “Keep drivin'”
Reviews.Author: hi_kity
Reviews.Content: I'm only rating this "Poor" instead of "Terrible" because the front desk personnel were reasonably pleasant. The place was a dump. Mold on the shower curtain, worn out carpet, very uncomfortable, sagging old bed. Kinda looked like what used to be called a flop house.

Reviews.Title: “I got a great deal”
Reviews.Author: karen b
Reviews.Content: On a last minute whim to go to the beach for a few days I called alot of hotels and they were all so high, then i called the bedtime Inn and they had a room at a great price. The girl I spoke with was very nice and helped me pick the right room. I had read some of the reviews on here so I asked her about my concerns and she informed me that they had got all new towels and new linens this year. So when I got to the motel check in was super easy but my boyfriend thought from the looks of the outside of the motel we would be roughing it.... But when we saw the room we were very pleased. The TV was big and nicer then the one we have at home, the bed was great and having a fridge in the room was great. I like going to Assateague Island and the ocean city beach so the location of the motel was perfect for hitting both beaches. In all we had a great time and it was great to eat at some different restaurants that were near the public marine with the money we saved on the motel. I would love to stay here again and the great prices make planing a trip more affordable.

Reviews.Title: “affordible but alittle dirty”
Reviews.Author: camigirlQueenAnneMd
Reviews.Content: The outside of this hotel doesnt look so bad,the front desk was very pleasent, and the price was very affordable for the area. I was alittle disapointed when i seen the room, We paid for a king an got a double,the curtains in the room were so old an dirty that they were actually falling apart,probally had never been taken dwn an washed since they were hung in the 1980;s, bed spread was just as old an faded.I of course looked for bed bugs [ i always do that] and didnt see any but there was alot of old hair stuck to the mattress which was pretty gross. the walls and carpet were dirty and the refridge smelled very foul.This could be a nice hotel in a nice area if they would just spend some time an money on the rooms.im not going to say i would never stay here again .but prob not unless ther were some changes

Reviews.Title: “Great place for an affordable price.”
Reviews.Author: tua15346
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised with the service and the room for my week trip. Only had one small problem and it was handled very quickly. Can't wait to go back and stay a second time.

Reviews.Title: “did not like it!”
Reviews.Author: t-c67
Reviews.Content: I hate giving a bad review, but in this instance I really could find little to redeem the place overall, the room was dingy, it just seemed dirty, i've stayed in hotels that were older but if its clean I don't mind old fashioned but it just didn't seem very clean, there was clearly no policy on noise as the neighbours came back at 3am and sat outside shouting for hours, i know this isn't technically the hotel's fault but its just a testimony to the type of place it was. I can find some good things, it had laundry facilities, free parking and the best thing of all the check in staff were absolutely lovely.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting!”
Reviews.Author: Amy M
Reviews.Content: We recently took a trip down to Ocean City, MD on September 10, 2011 for a wedding. My parents book a room as well. When we got to the motel we were very disappointed with the outside appearance but we thought we would give it a shot. We checked-in to the room to discover a very out dated appearance. The comforter was grossly stained the floor was dirty, the pillows were dingy, the bath towels were all stained and disgusting. The room was just gross. We were so disappointed with the filth that we showered went to the wedding and ended up driving home the same night! WOULD NOT RECOMMEND to anyone!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “we'll be coming back”
Reviews.Author: frannnnnnyy
Reviews.Content: My family and I wanted to get a way for just a weekend. While we weren't trying to spend a fortune on any hotel near the boardwalk, we found the Bedtime Inn to be just the perfect place. I thought the picture's online weren't misleading at all. I booked this hotel because of the positive outlook that the website gave. And I was not mistaken. As soon as we pulled into the parking lot, I figured I got my moneys worth because of how nice and family oriented it appeared. We will most likely be returning the same time next summer for another small family trip:) Not to mention, the staff is incredibly friendly.

Reviews.Title: “we loved it here!”
Reviews.Author: margarita s
Reviews.Content: we came to ocean city for vacation and basically needed a place to stay overnight. this hotel was just ideal for us! the prices were cheap, the stuff was really friendly and helpful. of course, the conditions were not perfect but it is right what you get for 80 dollars a night in a queen. being curious, i called to one of the hotels on the boardwalk and the prices were $200 and higher! so, bedtime inn is a wonderful place to spend your vacation for a good price. and we are definitely coming back next summer! Rita

Reviews.Title: “Dump, wierd internet connections, room smelled of mold, no hot water”
Reviews.Author: av8tor172
Reviews.Content: This was a dump! I called before coming to make sure they had internet as this was a business trip I needed good internet. Well every 3 minutes you get knocked off the internet and have to re-log on. You can only have 1 browser window open at a time and FTP ports are blocked, totally worthless internet. The rooms smelled of mold, no carpet and the floors were dirty. I had thought there was still pee in the tolet however when I turned the water on in the sink I discovered their water was actually yellow! Oh, the room smell was enought to make you sick! If you have AT&T cell phone, forget it! Very poor signal on my iPhone 3. Ok, not the fault of the motel, just bad location. However with everything else this just made the trip worse. For $125.00 per night I expected better. Never again....

Reviews.Title: “Very Disappointed...”
Reviews.Author: brendaley512
Reviews.Content: We were camping on Assateague Island when a huge storm hit and everything got soaked, after spending a late evening at landromat, we needed a place to stay for the night...This looked great from the outside, lots of cars. When we got into our room, aside from the size that was very small..I pulled back the covers and the sheets were full of sand...They had obviously not been changed..stains on the walls, and the carpet had 2 suspicious wet spots on it....too tired to look for anything else, we slept on top the covers and covered with towels. We voiced our complaints in the morning when we turned in the key, and they could have cared less.....Never stayed in a room that dirty.

Reviews.Title: “Beats Inlet Prices”
Reviews.Author: SlickNickster
Reviews.Content: When hotels across the bridge to OC easily double the price it makes this hotel an easy choice. I stayed here while photographing a wedding and the room was good for everything I needed it for. When I stayed here they were just reopening so there were still some kinks to be worked out. Our room also had a mini fridge which was a nice bonus. I don't mind the less than five minute drive to the beach so I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Dumpy place, far from activities, poor customer service”
Reviews.Author: john d
Reviews.Content: I booked a room at this place for 2 nights. When I arrived, I was expecting it to be closer to the beach and boardwalk, but it wasn't. It was about a mile away from the beach. It looked scuzzy from the moment we turned into the parking lot. I decided not to stay here because I wanted something cleaner and closer to the beach. I left a deposit which I didn't receive back even after numerous calls, emails, and faxes to management. This place sucks. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: “Small stay at Bedtime Inn”
Reviews.Author: Smalllarge6
Reviews.Content: Very convenient to all major attractions and restaurants. The staff was really nice and helpful. We loved going to the bus terminal 1/2 block away for a dollar ride for all day and free parking. The maid cleaned up pretty good. The air conditioner was great when it worked, sometimes it automatically shut off. Loved the heated pool. Not very noisy with full capacity. Enjoyed the experience. This time we took our 12 yr. old daughter. Next we want to book for 6 people-1girl-12, 3 boys 15,17,18, and parents. Thanks for a great vacation.

Reviews.Title: “WE ARE GOING BACK”
Reviews.Author: LEELEEPA
Reviews.Content: Whe we arrived, our room was warm as the air conditioner was not on. So we turned it on and waited about 20 minutes and it was not cooling. So I went down to the office and spoke to the girls behind the desk. A nice Spanish or Mexican man on a gulf cart came right up within moments and told us not to worry, that customer service is a priority. He then went to another room (203) and tested the air conditioner in that room after walking into our room and feeling how warm it was. He asked us to step into room 203 and tell him what we thought. It was atleast 10 degrees cooler in there and we asked if we could please have that room instead. He said "no problem" and helped us move our things. For my husband and I, this hotel was perfect. The rooms are small and clean, the pool is big, the staff is accomodating and the price is very reasonable. This is the first ime we have stayed in a hotel that wasn't ocean front , and now we wouldn't go anywhere else. It was nice to get away from the boardwak and the action at night by crossing over the drawbridge. We loved how close we were to a Rite-Aid next door and a Royal Farms gas station 2 doors down. Also, there is a Starbucks coffee next door to Royal Farms!! We didn't know how we were going to be without our starbucks all week, but it was right next to the hotel !! We have made plans to return on August 18-22nd and can't wait !! There was only one negative - the mattress sucked. BUT we are still going back!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice basic motel”
Reviews.Author: mjp51us
Reviews.Content: I like it when I am greeted upon arriving at the motel. The young lady had a great smile and was so helpful getting us checked into our room so fast. The location is close to Ocean City beaches and a short drive to Assateague National Park. The room was a basic motel room, a place to sleep, change clothes and then head out for sun and fun. I like their website. Lots of information and easy to use. Will stay here again and will recommend the motel to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Not at all as expected. Especially for the price.”
Reviews.Author: mrtee1
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying the bed frame was broken so there was a slope in the bed, not good for sleeping. There was a funny smell to the water, the wash cloth and towels they gave us were stained, when we told them about the broken bed they attempted to fix it I guess, just replace it PLEASE !! The staff was friendly but place was too out dated. I won't stay again. Price in the mid $200's per nite, too much for all the negatives.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it and we'll return asap.”
Reviews.Author: kellmar
Reviews.Content: July 4th,2011, we returned to the BedTime Inn Motel,West Ocean City, Md. to start our third summer season staying in this motel. Just a few minutes drive from the motel is the Assateague Island National Park Beach where you might see the wild horses if they choose to roam about. Prefer the boardwalk, shops amusement rides, Ocean City's Beach is just a short ride over the bridge. Crowded as the motel was during this hoilday weekend, BedTimes Inn's staff was very hospitable. The rooms and facilities were clean and well kept. We found the rates to be reasonable, too. We highly recommend a stay at the BedTime Inn Motel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean/Nice/Cheap Room Close to Beach!”
Reviews.Author: WOLVES911
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for under $90/night! Two full beds, a fridge, microwave and flat screen tv. It includes a sofa but it is small and sometimes you end up with a nasty,stained beat up pancake looking thing. Parking is as close to room as can be. Pool is terrible as they don't keep up with it and its full of mosquitoes.(literally). Game room is also nonexistent, an arcade from the 60s which probably doesn't work and a very old pool table which half the time is out if order and works when paid quarters,did I mention there is no change machine to facilitate this? One common complaint among my group of friends was the "penny water", the water from the sink and shower had a strong copper-like smell to it, very metallic, not too pleasant when brushing your teeth or when you notice the smell on your body after a shower. Nonetheless, the rooms are clean, bug free, feature updated air conditioning , are fairly comfortable and very close drive to beach for a great price considering its Ocean City!

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: stoogey95
Reviews.Content: Overall I was pleased with the hotel! besides the sink being a little rusted the rest of the room was good and suited my needs. If the sink would be updated in the hotel room I had, It would been great for the price. Overall I was still very pleased with the place and would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value...location somewhat far”
Reviews.Author: piikaboo2
Reviews.Content: My husband and I go to Ocean City at least once a season. However, we started traveling with our dog in order to avoid kennel fees and save some money. All the hotels that accept pets book very quickly and this was the last hotel available. After THOROUGHLY reading all the reviews, I decided to go for it and book the room. The price was very affordable, although I knew it would be a short drive to the beach/boardwalk/strip. The staff was friendly and kind. The room was older, ours did not have a flat screen TV. We tore the linens off the bed and conducted our own search for bedbugs....NONE. We still travel with our own sheets when not staying at a top-notch place for our own "peace of mind". The bathroom was small, somewhat poorly lit, and the shower towels barely covered my right thigh, but noneless the water was hot and the room didn't smell. It was maybe SLIGHTLY dingy in the bathroom, but it is an older building. Age aside, the room was CLEAN and a great value! We will stay again when traveling with our dog.

Reviews.Title: “NEVER AGAIN”
Reviews.Author: thatstar
Reviews.Content: When we arrived at the hotel we thought that it would be off the boardwalk. When i went to get the key to the room and take care of everything the woman at the desk didnt even seem friendly like no greeting to the hotel what-so-ever. and not even a smile. The first night there we got settled some of the things they mentioned on the website was not what we paid for. For as much as they charge u to stay there, they should have everything updated not just the TV. the fridge is some small old looking thing under the sink, the stove is a mess only one eye clicks on. We had to switch from one room to another because the toilet in the first room didnt work. the second room the shower was toooooo hot u couldnt even adjust it to make it at least warm, you basically either froze or burned so we had to take a bath everyday since we were there. and you had to wait til the tub filled up just enough because the water came out pretty slow. then the craziness is that the bathroom is so small they couldnt fit the bathroom sink into it so its outside the bathroom in the kitchen area thats pretty nasty if u ask me. how can someone be cooking and another person brushing their teeth in the same area just dont mix. then there were ants on the stove and counter, they came out all of the sudden and thats nasty if ur trying to cook. i mean do they get exterminators in that place?. They mention on the website wifi, there was nooooooooooo wifi so why mention it on the site? the lady at the desk told me they were working on getting it and they dont have it. thats a inconvenience to people that might have work to do or whatever. There was no pool open on the site it says swimming pool, we seen that someone was cleaning it and then when we called the desk they said that it dont open until memorial day like what kind of mess is that, when u have people that travel to that area on vacation. Then my fiance had ants in her bed luckily we had a double bed room. the only good thing is that the a.c and the television thats it! im so mad that we spent our money on a hotel that we didnt even feel welcomed too or even accomondated as what we seen online. we dont like false advertising. we spent 300 and something dollars for 3 nights. You had young kids that were next door to us basically having a party and on the site there is no tolerance for noise after a certain time, and we heard noise all night til about 3 in the morning, like who patrols or where is the security there?. Our last night i went to the office to get some tissue or ask for it and the lady at the desk act like i was bothering her! her attitude was horrible and when we called about the ants she didnt really try to fix the issue, her attitude was the worst ever , all she said was the only thing she could do was maybe change our room, or if she had some bug spray she would come and spray it , like really?! it was the worst hotel we have ever been to, and we go to hotels all the time when we go away. We wasted no time on the check out day, i was up early packing because we had the worst time. we left way before 11 a.m...I thought hotels are supposed to make ur stay a great one, not one that we just couldnt wait to leave. just bad bad bad. This was our first and last time here..

Reviews.Title: “Great value at a clean, friendly family hotel”
Reviews.Author: jillanddave
Reviews.Content: My family and I decided on a whim to check out the Bedtime Inn and were very pleasantly surprised. The rooms were exceptionally nice-new tile floors, flat screen tv, immaculate refrigerator and microwave-and the king suite we got was surprisingly affordable (especially when compared to the usual OC rates). The two room suite was roomy and comfortable and provided my husband and I some privacy, which was wonderful. The amenities were great-swimming pool, basketball hoop, volleyball court, game room for the kids-and the location was perfect. The hotel staff was unfailingly friendly and top-notch. We will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “You get what you paid for”
Reviews.Author: angela102
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this hotel to anyone. The carpet and tiled floors were so gross I wore my flip flops inside the room...I felt like I was back in college. The rooms were the smallest I have ever seen and the wallpaper and paint were hanging off the walls. They definitely did not provided shampoo, alarm clock, or iron and the tv looked like it was from the 60's. The towels provided were stained, rough, and tiny...you should bring your own! I had the worst nights sleep ever in my life because the bed was hard, sheets were gross, and a/c was so loud it kept me up all night. I agree with the review below, you would be better off sleeping in your car!!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, what we expected for the price”
Reviews.Author: denisejustme
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I just returned from the Bedtime Inn and we overall enjoyed our weekend there. We booked the room at the last minute and were surprised when they had a room available. When we first walked into the room I can see that we were a little disappointed. The room was very small and out dated. The bed was clean comfortable. I brought along extra sheets just in case and we used them for cover since I don't use the comforter at ANY hotel/motel. The room had a slight odor that smelled like smoking was permitted at some point although it was a non-smiking room. There was a pool there but we never used it. We were told that we could use it after hours as long as we were quiet. I thought that was cool and a little mad that I didn't take advantage of it. I also took along towels and washclothes from home and I am glad that I did. The towels there are so hard and thin. We pretty much just used them to dry our hands. LOL Like I said, we didn't expect too much because the room was less than other motels in the area so we weren't disappointed. I wouldn't want to stay there any longer than two nights. We would drive out car to the park and ride and ride the bus to the boardwalk (just $1/day!!!). That was very conveineint and allowed us to only drive our car about 10 miles the time we were there. If you are looking for a clean, comfortable place to stay with no frills, this is the place for you. It's old but it serves the purpose. Just don't expect too much or you will be disappointed! :-) The staff is great though and it's very quiet at night!

Reviews.Title: “Total dump, cheap, dirty, tiny...”
Reviews.Author: Brocls1
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a total dump. Do not read all the bad reviews and talk yourself into thinking everyone was making things up. The rooms are tiny, to small to even move around in. There are no alarm clocks in the room. The towels are old, tiny and stained. I had a big gob of red hair in my washrag I found when it got loose on my face. No wifi. There seems to be a couple families that live in the hotel. One family has a table with chairs set up in a parking space along with a barbecue grill that they light huge fires in. Both of these families had the nasty little laundry room held hostage for our entire stay. Oh ya, the washers and dryers have a sign on them that says they are for washing beach clothes only. There is a clothes iron in the laundry room tied to the wall, none in your room. Under the stairway landing there was a big turd and toilet paper that stayed there in plain view for 5 days. One morning we woke up and there were beer bottles broken all around our car. Please stay away from this dump. Sleep in your car if you can't afford a decent room. It would even be better to cancel your vacation and stay home.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for the money”
Reviews.Author: naoste
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Bedtime Inn during a lacrosse tournament in June because it was so convenient to Berlin (where most of the games were played). What we found - the Bedtime Inn was also much more convenient for travel back in forth to Assateague Island, where the beaches are far superior to Ocean City! There are also great restaurants on the other side of Route 50 as well as go-cart tracks, making this location surprisingly fun! The hotel itself is clean and comfortable and the tile floor was especially welcomed by our two dogs. But what was most unusual and unexpected was the attentiveness of the staff - this is obviously a family-run business where all the employees we encountered seemed to have an interest in our repeat business.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid it at all costs!!!”
Reviews.Author: bschiavoni
Reviews.Content: My husband and I made the mistake of driving to Ocean City for the night without making reservations. Unfortunately, many properties required a minimum 2-night stay, so we didn't have much to choose from. So, we found the Bedtime Inn. After taxes, the cost of our room was $177. Maybe not high for Ocean City, but way more expensive than it deserved. The room smelled like something had died in it. When I opened the refrigerator (which didn't work), I found the source of the smell. Nothing was in the fridge, but something must have been at one time. The bath towels were not much larger than hand towels, and the wash cloths felt like sandpaper. So, if you are trying to exfoliate, this might be your spot. Even though it was about 96 degrees outside, the air conditioner was not turned on when we checked in. It took hours too partially cool the room off, but the AC only blew cool air, more like a vent than an AC. In truth, there isn't anything good I can say about this place, and I highly recommend staying somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff and Good Room”
Reviews.Author: Seguevara
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the bedtime inn was great, we started off by meeting the nicest staff at the front office. They were very happy and helpful. When we arrived to our room, the AC was not working at the time but they brought maintenance over in no more than 5 minutes. Maintenance quickly solved the problem and our stay was wonderful. Will stay here again and highly recommend it to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location”
Reviews.Author: kellmar
Reviews.Content: We've been staying at Bedtime Inn for the last two summers. The location is convenient to the beaches, boardwalk, and great restaurants. Also within minutes of Assateague National Park, one of the best Beaches on the East Coast. The staff at the motel are excellent and go out of their way to accommodate you. We found our stay to be quiet and very relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “No renovation since 1950's...”
Reviews.Author: Lannes_Perlmutter
Reviews.Content: We got a king room, with king size bed, microwave and refrigerator and paid U$110 per night. Starting from the amenities: they say on their website that they have a heated pool, but when you ask for the heat they say the pool is not heated, the water was VERY cold. Besides that, they have a Mexican restaurant at the front of the hotel (aside the office) and the back of the kitchen is towards the pool, so the workers keep observing everything that you do. The volleyball court has weeds and barely has sand on it. The room was terrible. Starting with the cheap perfume smell that took us 1 1/2 days with AC or FAN ON THE WHOLE TIME (my allergies still bother me). The bed is hand painted, looking like cheap motel. The bed sheets and cover had all kinds of hair (disgusting!) and the bathroom had crust (from not washing/cleaning) all around the toilet flush button, the shower and the sink. The curtains of the room are made of plastic, and there's no light fabric under it, which means you have to have a dark room all the time to have your privacy.The light of the room and the lamps are terrible and don't light up anything. The whole room looks like it doesn't get a renovation since the 50's (and it needs it URGENT!!) I would NOT stay in this hotel ever again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable and walking distance to boardwalk!”
Reviews.Author: mikalamaui77
Reviews.Content: Really enjoyed my stay here...the rooms are very clean and comfy. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Nice casual motel with a good value.

Reviews.Title: “NICE CLEAN HOTEL. GOOD PRICES. GREAT STAFF.”
Reviews.Author: iloveoc0101
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Bedtime Inn with 2 children under 5. The price was perfect, the rooms were a great size. I loved loved loved the tile in the rooms- MUCH more sanitary than carpet!! (think about how gross a hotel carpet is!) Our rooms was much nicer than we anticipated, I have to say we did not have any of the experiences that some of the other reviewers had!! The staff was SUPER friendly and accommodating with everything. Overall i would say a great hotel for families! CLEAN, AFFORDABLE, fun getaway!!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean place, friendly people, great price!”
Reviews.Author: ala16
Reviews.Content: Our room was extremely clean. The people there were very friendly, and we booked our hotel at a very great low price. Overall, we had a great experience and would definitely love to come back without a doubt!

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel in the history of the world.”
Reviews.Author: jerwmy55th
Reviews.Content: This hotel was cheap and trashy, the room was tiny, the bathroom did not work, the pool water was disgustingly green as if filled with slime. The hotel is cheaper than the other hotels in the area but they should never charge more than 10 dollars a night. I've stayed at nicer hostels in third world countries that were nicer than this place. It made me so angry to stay here.
